interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LXIANGN Nail Glass Cup With Lid Cute Dappen Dishes 2PCS Heart Shaped Bowl Glass Mini Crystal Bowls for Nail Art Manicure Care Tools
Review Date: 2021/06/01
Store: LXIANGN
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {}
Review Text: It is maybe 2 inches around in size small but perfect for monomer and powder to do nails! My sister saw these and loved them and wanted them for earrings which would be a great idea too!! The color isn't inside but underneath so if you put monomer in them it won't discolor it! These are great! I am so happy with them and highly recommend these for nail tech use! I used a little pipette to fill them with powder and liquid.
Review Title: Nail tech use, perfect for me!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
As a licensed Cosmetologist I've used ALOT of files and this shape is the best for when I so nail enhancements because I can get into the cuticle area and ensure it is smooth perfectly with the round side and then the straight side is good for filing the sides and shaping the nails! These are good quality and exactly as I expected!!
Best shape for nail files!!

lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
lootaan
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
Sturdy tips on the thicker side but not obnoxiously thick they're perfect! I'm a nail tech (Licensed) and have used MANY different nail tips in my lifetime and never have I ever had a nail container have an actual slot for nail glue to be stored with them!! This is so smart and all of them should be like this! I will keep this container long after the tips are all used up lol!!
10 stars!!! Sturdy not bulky tips, CONTAINER HAS SLOT FOR GLUE TO BE STORED!!
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These colors are so much more vibrant than they look online for sure! They are just like breathtaking the shimmer in them is so  pretty I absolutely adore these polishes I cannot wait to get to use them on my nails and in the salon! I was surprised they were so bright when I opened the bottles! It also came with instructions too if you've never used gel polish too! Just make sure you have a UV lamp to cure these (=
SO PRETTY AND SUPER VIBRANT
Yolife Acrylic Nail Brush with100% Pure Kolinsky Sable, Nail Art Brush With Brilliant crystal Handle, for Manicure Pedicure (6#, Silver)
YOLIFE
{'Color': 'Silver', 'Brand': 'YOLIFE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 2 x 0.3 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
This is some work I did with the brushes! The acrylic brush is perfect for doing french tips with acrylic and the brushes are perfect for art. I have a ton of art brushes I use as you can see and these ones are not only the cutest but the best quality. All my brushes are from amazon and very in price but these are so much nicer! A must have for holidays (= We need good quality tools like these for good nails!!
Cosmetologist review!
Bicrops Professional Haircutting Shears Kit, Stainless Steel Beard Hairdressing Scissors Set, Regular Hair Shear, Thinning Scissor, Leather Case. Home Hair Salon For Men And Women
Bicrops
{'Material': 'Stainless Steel, Leather', 'Brand': 'Bicrops', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Style': 'Classic', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '9.61 x 4.53 x 1.34 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '779324784056', 'Manufacturer': 'Bicrops'}
First of all this case is nice and worth the listed price on it's own! I have like 15 pairs of scissors and they're all dull so I figured I'd give these a try! I'm soo glad I did, I have nothing I dislike or don't love and I always have something I dislike usually lol. These have cute little blue gems and are really sharp and do a great job they're comfortable for my little hands and my chubby fingers! So excited to use them at work tommorrow!!! They have a nice weight to them I would expect to pay like $50+ for these atleast so I am blown away. I'm so glad I chose these!!
Good buy- Licensed pro going on 11 years!

Good info perfect to hand out!

profile:
User Summary:

- **Passion for Nail Art, Hair, and Beauty**: The user is a licensed technician dedicated to nail art, with a growing interest in hair extensions and beauty aesthetics. They enjoy discovering vibrant and innovative products that facilitate creative expression.

- **Commitment to Quality**: Their preference for high-quality tools and materials remains evident. The user consistently seeks products that deliver superior performance, design, and exceptional value, showcasing delight in finding items that exceed expectations.

- **Size and Shape Preference**: The user favors tools with flexible dimensions for a meticulous approach to beauty enhancements, now demonstrating an appreciation for small, functional containers ideal for precise applications in nail services.

- **Performance and Versatility**: Performance continues to be a critical factor in their decision-making. They prioritize versatile tools that serve both routine tasks and innovative challenges, further aligning with their exploration of diverse supplies.

- **Positive Experiences**: Recent interactions emphasize their enthusiasm for products that combine functionality with aesthetic appeal. The user recently highlighted the effectiveness of small, distinctive tools for professional use, appreciating features that maintain clarity and color integrity.

Overall, the user is a discerning and passionate beauty professional, driven by a commitment to quality, innovation, and versatility to elevate their creative and professional results, consistently seeking effective tools that enhance the customer experience. Their recent purchase further reflects their dedication to optimizing their nail art practice with practical yet stylish options.
